Message.TypeName: Do not pass literals as localized parameters
Message.Issue: Method 'Manager.Import()' passes a literal string as parameter 'message' of a call to 'Locations.MessageBoxShow(string, MessageBoxButton, MessageBoxImage)'. Retrieve the following string(s) from a resource table instead: "Engineering preset file is invalid. Cannot import.".

Method 'Manager.Import()' passes a literal string as parameter 'message' of a call to 'Locations.MessageBoxShow(string, MessageBoxButton, MessageBoxImage)'. Retrieve the following string(s) from a resource table instead: "File is already in library.\r\n\r\nOverwrite?".

Rule.TypeName: Do not pass literals as localized parameters
Rule.Name: Do not pass literals as localized parameters
Rule.Description: Literal strings that are embedded in source code are difficult to localize. Avoid passing literal strings as arguments in circumstances where a localized string is generally expected.
Rule.Resolution: Method {0} passes a literal string as parameter '{1}' of a call to {2}. Retrieve the following string(s) from a resource table instead: {3}.
